tool_description: A rock solid, low cost SMS API that companies and organisations of all sizes can rely on.
name: The SMS Works
title: The SMS Works

api_list.name: /messages/send
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sms-works2.p.rapidapi.com/messages/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sms-works2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sms-works2.p.rapidapi.com/messages/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sms-works2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
